summary: Diverse background in various sectors of the tech industry, with solid education and curiosity that have driven a career spanning six years. Proven expertise in building applications across all layers, from server architecture to data storage and user interface. Skilled in leading projects, implementing SDLC methodologies, and streamlining workflow processes to enhance team efficiency and delivery.

professionalExperience.description: Collaborate with startups and SMEs to develop and maintain websites and web applications using modern technologies.
highlights: Architecture design and API implementation for various projects
Building scalable, maintainable, and secure applications
Key collaborations with national clients on high-visibility projects
Implementation of dynamic frontend solutions with React/Vue/Astro
Backend development with Node.js, Express, and Postgres

professionalExperience.description: Participated in the development and maintenance of web applications for corporate clients, leveraging modern JavaScript frameworks.
highlights: Collaborated in agile teams to deliver high-quality web solutions
Implemented responsive UI components using React and state management
Integrated with RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints
Optimized applications for performance across devices

keyProjects.name: E-commerce Platform Redesign
keyProjects.description: Complete overhaul of a legacy e-commerce system to modern technology stack
highlights: Improved site performance by 60%
Implemented JAMstack architecture for enhanced security
Reduced operational costs by 40%
Increased conversion rates by 25%

keyProjects.name: Enterprise Resource Management System
keyProjects.description: Modular ERP system providing integrated solutions for manufacturing clients
highlights: Real-time data synchronization across modules
Custom reporting and analytics dashboard
Integration with IoT devices for production monitoring

personalAchievements: Successfully migrated multiple legacy applications to modern frameworks
Mentored junior developers, creating comprehensive onboarding documentation
Speaker at regional web development conferences
Open-source contributor to several popular JavaScript libraries
professionalPhilosophy: Committed to developing elegant solutions that balance technical excellence with user experience. Advocate for clean, maintainable code and collaborative development processes. Always seeking to expand knowledge and embrace new technologies that enhance digital experiences.
additionalCompetencies: Project planning and agile methodology implementation
UI/UX design principles and best practices

highlights: Focus on Software Engineering
Data Structures & Algorithms
Frontend & Backend Specialization

interests: Continuous learning through online courses and workshops
